mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, gender, birthday, traits_json, state, created_time, updated_time FROM human WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, user_id, name, gender, birthday, traits_json, state, created_time, updated_time FROM human WHERE id = #{id} AND state = 0
SELECT id, user_id, name, gender, birthday, traits_json, state, created_time, updated_time FROM human WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND state = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO human (id, user_id, name, gender, birthday, traits_json, state, created_time, updated_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{traitsJson}, 0, NOW(), NOW())
